title: Shriram City Union’s housing finance subsidiary may hit IPO market after reaching Rs 10,000-crore AUM... - Moneycontrol
content: Shriram City Union’s housing finance subsidiary may hit IPO market after reaching Rs 10,000-crore AUM...  Moneycontrol
description: Whether I have anything to say to the regulator, it is already done and dusted. The regulator is slowly moving us towards bank-like regulations or even tighter. Today we are probably governed tighter than banks on classification of NPAs, YS Chakravarti said.
